section.title: Basic usage
section.p: This is for users wanting a graphical user interface to svn, like the program CVL used for cvs. Users accustomed to the command line (and comments such as cvs up etc. may safely ignore this chapter, and stick to the previous one.

Write https://victorio.uit.no/repos into the URL box. Choose the map where you would like to place the files in the Destination Directory box (we suggest adding repos to the end of the path, to keep svn maps in a separate place), then press OK.
Press "Permanently" when the SSL Certificate dialog appears.

section.title: Working with the repository
section.p: In the directory that you did the checkout you will now have a directory called repos, where all our code is contained. Usually the daily work goes on in the repos/trunk directory.
